greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of iterations of f(x) = phi(x)+1 on n required to reach a prime.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Table[Length[NestWhileList[EulerPhi[#] + 1 &, n, UnsameQ, All]] - 2, {n, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Oct 17 2013 *)
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
